options.text: You have been walking for a while. It's getting dark and you reach the end of the road. There is an old house at the end of the road, and a path that goes into the forest towards east.
As you walk through the door, the air gets colder and you start shivering. You have the feeling that something terrible is about to happen.
There is something unsettling about this forest, but you can't put your finger on what it is.
You hear the sound of a rock landing between the fooliage and something moving. Better go back.
